SEARCH
Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.listener

Interface DynamicTransitionListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicActivity, DynamicDrawerActivity, DynamicFragment, DynamicNavigationActivity, DynamicPermissionsActivity, DynamicPermissionsFragment, DynamicPreviewActivity, DynamicRemoteThemeFragment, DynamicSplashActivity, DynamicSplashFragment, DynamicStateActivity, DynamicSystemActivity, DynamicThemeFragment, DynamicTutorialActivity, DynamicTutorialFragment, DynamicViewPager2Fragment, DynamicViewPagerFragment, DynamicWidgetActivity, ThemeFragment
public interface DynamicTransitionListener
An interface to listen the transition events.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Object
    getDynamicEnterTransition()
    Returns the enter transition used by his listener.
    Object
    getDynamicExitTransition()
    Returns the exit transition used by his listener.
    Object
    getDynamicReenterTransition()
    Returns the reenter transition used by his listener.
    Object
    getDynamicReturnTransition()
    Returns the return transition used by his listener.
    View
    getPostponeTransitionView()
    This method will be called to postpone the transition until the returned view is laid.
    Object
    onAdjustEnterReturnTransition(Object transition, boolean enter)
    This method will be called to optionally to adjust the enter and return transitions before applying.
    Object
    onAdjustExitReenterTransition(Object transition, boolean exit)
    This method will be called to optionally to adjust the exit and reenter transitions before applying.
    void
    onApplyTransitions(boolean exit)
    This method will be called on applying transitions.
    View
    onFindView(int resultCode, int position, String name, int viewId)
    This method will be called to find the view according to the transition name or resource id.

  • Method Details

    • onApplyTransitions

      void onApplyTransitions(boolean exit)
      This method will be called on applying transitions.

      It is recommended to do any shared element adjustments here like postponing the transition.

      Parameters:
      exit - true if the activity is exiting.

    • getDynamicEnterTransition

      @Nullable Object getDynamicEnterTransition()
      Returns the enter transition used by his listener.
      Returns:
      The enter transition used by his listener.
      See Also:
      • Window.setEnterTransition(android.transition.Transition)
      • Fragment.setEnterTransition(Object)
      • onAdjustEnterReturnTransition(Object, boolean)

    • getDynamicReturnTransition

      @Nullable Object getDynamicReturnTransition()
      Returns the return transition used by his listener.
      Returns:
      The return transition transition used by his listener.
      See Also:
      • Window.setExitTransition(android.transition.Transition)
      • Fragment.setExitTransition(Object)
      • onAdjustEnterReturnTransition(Object, boolean)

    • getDynamicExitTransition

      @Nullable Object getDynamicExitTransition()
      Returns the exit transition used by his listener.
      Returns:
      The exit transition used by his listener.
      See Also:
      • Window.setExitTransition(android.transition.Transition)
      • Fragment.setEnterTransition(Object)
      • onAdjustExitReenterTransition(Object, boolean)

    • getDynamicReenterTransition

      @Nullable Object getDynamicReenterTransition()
      Returns the reenter transition used by his listener.
      Returns:
      The reenter transition used by his listener.
      See Also:
      • Window.setReenterTransition(android.transition.Transition)
      • Fragment.setReenterTransition(Object)
      • onAdjustExitReenterTransition(Object, boolean)

    • onAdjustEnterReturnTransition

      @Nullable Object onAdjustEnterReturnTransition(@Nullable Object transition, boolean enter)
      This method will be called to optionally to adjust the enter and return transitions before applying.
      Parameters:
      transition - The transition to be adjusted.
      enter - true if enter transition, otherwise return transition.
      Returns:
      The adjusted enter or return transition before applying.
      See Also:
      • getDynamicEnterTransition()
      • getDynamicReturnTransition()

    • onAdjustExitReenterTransition

      @Nullable Object onAdjustExitReenterTransition(@Nullable Object transition, boolean exit)
      This method will be called to optionally to adjust the exit and reenter transitions before applying.
      Parameters:
      transition - The transition to be adjusted.
      exit - true if exit transition, otherwise reenter transition.
      Returns:
      The adjusted exit or reenter transition before applying.
      See Also:
      • getDynamicExitTransition()
      • getDynamicReenterTransition()

    • getPostponeTransitionView

      @Nullable View getPostponeTransitionView()
      This method will be called to postpone the transition until the returned view is laid.

      It will be called only on API 21 and above.

      Returns:
      The view to postpone the transition.

    • onFindView

      @Nullable View onFindView(int resultCode, int position, @NonNull String name, @IdRes int viewId)
      This method will be called to find the view according to the transition name or resource id.

      It will be called only on API 21 and above.

      Parameters:
      resultCode - The transition result code.
      position - The position of the shared element.
      name - The transition name of the view.
      viewId - The id resource to find the view by id.
      Returns:
      The view according to the view id.
